articles.title: KCNA Delegation Leaves for Azerbaijan
articles.content:
KCNA Delegation Leaves for Azerbaijan
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Central News Agency headed by Director General Kim Chang Gwang left here Saturday to take part in the Fifth News Agencies World Congress and the 16th OANA General Assembly to be held in Baku, Azerbaijan.
					 The delegation was seen off at Pyongyang International Airport by Rim Ho Ryong, vice-director general of the KCNA, and Alexandr Minaev, minister-councilor of the Russian Embassy here.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Olympic Committee Leaves for Qatar
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Olympic Committee Leaves for Qatar
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Olympic Committee led by Chairman Ri Jong Mu left here Saturday to take part in the 21st ANOC General Assembly to be held in Doha.

articles.title: Results from Recovery Efforts in Disaster Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Results from Recovery Efforts in Disaster Areas of DPRK
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- A rapid progress has been made in the work to recover flood-hit Musan County of the DPRK.
					 People's security persons built a dike with 40,000 cubic meters of earth only in a week, carried out the excavation of 350 cubic meters for revetment in one day and gathered 5,000 cubic meters of rubble stones to finish the embankment along the Tuman River in 500 meter-long section in a little more than ten days.

articles.title: FIFA High Level Coaching Course Held in DPRK
articles.content:
FIFA High Level Coaching Course Held in DPRK
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- A FIFA high level coaching course was held in Pyongyang from November 1 to 5.
					 Taking part in the course, divided into theoretical and practical sections, were coaches from various sports teams of the DPRK.
					
					 It focused on such subjects as the coaching for players, the method of physical training and the role of coaches in a match.
					
					 The course was officiated by Constantine Stephen, a lecturer of FIFA.
					
					 Meanwhile, a FIFA youth coaches course took place on November 7-11.

articles.title: Aerial Tour of Pyongyang Continues
articles.content:
Aerial Tour of Pyongyang Continues
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The aerial tour of Pyongyang by super-light planes continues in the DPRK, which is offered by the Mirim Air Club from late July. 
					 More than 1,400 tourists got onboard and at least 5,500 people visited the club to see flights until now.
					
					 The club is near to the Mirim Riding Club in Pyongyang.
					
					 According to Kim Il Ryong, head of the club, the super-light planes are named "Kkulbol (honey bee)" and steered by young men and women of about 20.
					
					 Their flight altitude is 300m, Kim said, adding that the planes may make a shuttle flight to the West Sea Barrage and fly in formation at requests.
					
					 Jon Su Chol, a resident in North Hwanghae Province, told KCNA that enjoying the aerial tour, he came to keenly feel again the loving care shown by the Workers' Party of Korea for the people. 
					
					 I will do my best for my country advancing toward a highly civilized nation, he stressed.

articles.title: New Protective Agent Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Protective Agent Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- A new protective agent for fine art pieces of national treasure was developed in the DPRK.
					 According to Pak Chang Guk, who developed the agent, it is a patent product made of locally available special functional nano-composite shielding fine art pieces from ultraviolet, oxidation and mold.
					
					 It causes no chemical reaction to different painting materials and prevents color fading without any negative effect on fine art pieces. And it helps restoring color tones and has a good effect on preventing moisture. 
					
					 As it has a wide range of application, it has been highly appreciated by many units, including the Korean Art Gallery, Korean Central History Museum and Mausoleum of King Tongmyong.
					
					 The agent was already registered as one of the national sci-tech achievements.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Performs in South Phyongan Province
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Performs in South Phyongan Province
Phyongsong, November 12 (KCNA) -- Artistes of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe have performed in Phyongsong City every day before full house since they gave their presentation in Anju and Sunchon cities, while on local performance tour.
					 The performance was enjoyed by people from all walks of life and officials in the province.
					
					 The performance began with music "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu".
					
					 Through female chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un", female duet "His Humanity" and other numbers artistes truthfully represented the immense pride and honor of the service personnel and civilians of the DPRK being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 Female solo and pangchang "It Is Offensive", light music "Higher and Faster," etc. encouraged the workers and other people in the city in their charge towards the finish line in the 200-day campaign.
					
					 Tap dance "Youth Days" and "Cheerful Soldier on the Cook's Duty" and folk dance "Blacksmith Dance", national dance "Drum Dance" and other numbers delighted the audience.
					
					 The performance will continue.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Park Geun Hye's Moves to Tide over Crisis
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Park Geun Hye's Moves to Tide over Crisis
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of traitors are making desperate efforts to seek a way out of the worst crisis in history.
					 Days ago, traitor Park Geun Hye vociferated about the "story of threat from the north" and the puppet military brass hats of south Korea ceaselessly toured the areas along the Military Demarcation Line to talk about "provocation by the north," "immediate counteraction" and "principle of 'taking measure first and making report next'" while getting frantic with the confrontation rackets by intentionally spreading the story of "security crisis".
					
					 This is nothing but a trite method of the Park's group to ratchet up the tension with the north and lead it to "provocation" and rapidly escalate the north-south confrontation with it as pretence so as to divert elsewhere the attention of the public focused on her scandal.
					
					 Now Park Geun Hye has been driven into the inescapable abyss of ruin after the disclosure of the extra-large power-related "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal."
					
					 She is at the crossroads of whether she will have to step down of her own accord or be impeached. This is the unavoidable fate of Park who resorted to unpopular and traitorous rule.
					
					 During her office, she spent her days by creating social crisis through the "story of threat from the north" aimed to intentionally stir up the "security" mentality of the south Korean people whenever she was driven into the extreme ruling crisis.
					
					 When all the south Koreans were angry and launched candlelight actions over the ferry Sewol disaster, the Park's group made a preemptive attack on the north in the hotspot waters in the West Sea of Korea and ran amuck to brand the north as a "provoker".
					
					 South Korean people well know that a door of toilet found in a mountain was branded as a "drone from the north" and a vacuum flask found in the sea as "shell of the north" to shield the "government".
					
					 No one can vouch that Park Geun Hye, hit hard from all sides, will not seek a way out in such reckless military provocation as "immediate counteraction" in reliance on the puppet military authorities.
					
					 Whenever she was driven into the cliff by hideous cases including Jong Yun Hoe's interference in the state affairs and Song Wan Jong incident, she let the puppet military authorities to take the lead in the "security crisis" rackets.
					
					 All kinds of joint military drills were staged timed to coincide with the crisis and the U.S. strategic nuclear submarine equipped with nuclear warheads was introduced into south Korea. These are by no means accidental. 
					
					 Now all Koreans are heightening vigilance against the moves of Park Geun Hye and the puppet military group to reverse the situation by the reckless "shocking method".
					
					 The foolish moves to tide over the crisis will precipitate the miserable ruin.

articles.title: Ouster of Park Geun Hye Is Urgent: S. Korean CBS
articles.content:
Ouster of Park Geun Hye Is Urgent: S. Korean CBS
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean CBS reported Thursday that Choe Sun Sil interfered in state affairs under instructions of Park Geun Hye. 
					 A file recording the voice of Park instructing a former secretary of Chongwadae to show Choe Sun SIl internal documents of Chongwadae to get her opinion was reportedly found in a smart phone of the secretary, it disclosed, adding:
					
					 An Jong Bom, former chief secretary for policy coordination of Chongwadae, who is suspected of seizing an ad company, had confessed that it was under an instruction of the "president."
					
					 If this confession is true, the situation is very critical as it proves that Park had been involved in leakage of secrets and fund-raising.
					
					 To clear all suspicions, Park should resign and an early "presidential" election should be held.

articles.title: Actions for Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime Called for
articles.content:
Actions for Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime Called for
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The People's Emergency Action to Force the Park Geun Hye Regime to Step down grouping more than 1 550 organizations including the 2016 Headquarters for People's All-out Action made public an inaugural declaration on November 9, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The organization in the declaration called upon all the people to turn out in the struggle to force the Park Geun Hye regime to step down.
					
					 The declaration went on:
					
					 The "president" should immediately step down together with those ministers she appointed.
					
					 Let us meet on November 12, let one million people turn out in all-people action!
					
					 Let us force the Park Geun Hye regime to step down by the force of the people!

articles.title: S. Korean People Demand Traitor Park Geun Hye Step Down
articles.content:
S. Korean People Demand Traitor Park Geun Hye Step Down
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- South Korean people from all walks of life staged actions in Seoul demanding traitor Park Geun Hye step down as she pushed the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe through the unprecedented monopolization of administration, according to reports.
					 The organizations under the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference in Kwanghwamun on Nov. 9.
					
					 They said that Park Geun Hye leaked secret information about security and diplomacy to a civilian and got advice from her, adding that this was the most serious case in the world history and unbearable international shame.
					
					 Next day, 205 personages of different social standings of south Korea held a press conference demanding Park Geun Hye step down and made public a declaration on the situation.
					
					 The declaration demanded the authorities retract the action to shut down the Kaesong Industrial Zone, the decision on THAAD deployment and the decision to indefinitely extend the transfer of OPECON and scrap the "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 On the same day, the emergency measure committee of the Kaesong Industrial Zone held a meeting at Youido and made public an appeal calling for probe into the truth behind the action to shut down the zone and start the negotiations for restarting the zone.

articles.title: People's Resistance Declared, Joint Action Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
People's Resistance Declared, Joint Action Launched in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Organizations for forcing the Park Geun Hye regime to step down are being formed in various areas and sectors of south Korea, sparking off popular resistance, according to reports from Seoul.
					 According to information available from the Emergency People's Action for Ouster of the Park Geun Hye Regime, 13 sector measure councils including the Situation Council of Students for Ouster of Park Geun Hye, the Solidarity of Secondary and High School Students, the Emergency Situation Council of Minor Traders and Industrialists and the Christian Movement Headquarters were formed as of Nov. 9.
					
					 The University Students Council groups 66 university students councils and 39 university students bodies and involves university students movement for issuing declarations on the situation in 135 places from across south Korea.
					
					 203 organizations formed the Seoul Action for Ouster of Park Geun Hye and issued a declaration on the situation.
					
					 The Headquarters of the Movement for Ouster of the Park Geun Hye Regime grouping 351 civic and public, religious and political circles was formed in South Jolla Province.
					
					 At least 100 organizations in south Korean Kangwon Province formed the Emergency Kangwon Action for Ouster of the Park Geun Hye Regime.
					
					 Candlelight actions demanding ouster of the regime are simultaneously under way in 68 areas including cities, counties and districts.
					
					 Overseas Koreans said they would launch solidarity actions of various forms including declarations on the situation and candlelight rallies, timed to coincide with the people's all-out action of the south Korean people.

articles.title: Projected Conclusion of Military Agreement with Japan Rejected in S. Korea
articles.content:
Projected Conclusion of Military Agreement with Japan Rejected in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- 120 organizations of south Korea including the Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation and the Council of Bereaved Families of Men of Merit for Independence held a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 9 at which they demanded the authorities stop at once the moves for concluding a treacherous agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan, according to Tongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 At the press conference speakers said that the agreement would help pave the way for the Japan "Self-Defense Forces'" to stage a comeback to the Korean peninsula and support and back Japan dreaming of reviving militarism and thus wreck peace on the peninsula.

articles.title: To Deal with Park Geun Hye Whose Days Are Numbered Will Only Invite Disgrace and Ill Fame
articles.content:
To Deal with Park Geun Hye Whose Days Are Numbered Will Only Invite Disgrace and Ill Fame
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Jong Kil Song, researcher at the  Institute for Disarmament and Peace of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, Saturday made public a commentary titled "To deal with traitor Park Geun Hye whose days are numbered will only invite disgrace and ill fame".
					 It said:
					
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye, whose fate is hanging by a thread due to the worst political scandal, again spouted reckless remarks against the DPRK.
					
					 She is facing torrents of criticism of the world-shocking political scandal and expected to be severely punished by the people. Against this backdrop she uttered before a foreign visitor a litany of nonsensical words about the future of the north and sanctions and pressure on it.
					
					 This is nothing but a cynical ploy to divert elsewhere the attention of the people who hold that the only way for Park Geun Hye to make a sincere apology to them is to step down and face the punishment.
					
					 She has so far vociferated about "changes" in the DPRK and so on as advised by a green shaman. However, the Park Geun Hye puppet regime is on the brink of collapse due to all kinds of scandals.
					
					 Great irony is that some countries pin hopes on the empty promises for economic aid made by Park Geun Hye, forsaken by the people.
					
					 Those countries will suffer shame and disgrace only if they chime in with the reckless remarks of Park Geun Hye more dead than alive for a paltry amount of money.
					
					 Even the U.S. master is now regarding Park Geun Hye as bitter cucumber.
					
					 Whichever country is concerned for the peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region should face up to the strategic position of the DPRK and the present reality and shape policies suited to them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Moscow
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Moscow
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- A Russian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Moscow on Nov. 8.
					 V. A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, was elected chairman of the committee. The committee comprises famous figures such as Dmitri Yazov, former minister of Defence of the Soviet Union, and Sazhi Umalatova, chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia.
					
					 It decided to significantly organize political and cultural functions such as a remembrance meeting and photo and book exhibition on the 5th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Austria
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- An Austrian committee for remembering HE Kim Jong Il was formed in Vienna on Nov. 7.
					 Thomas Losh, general secretary of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold significant political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and Songun revolutionary exploits of Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Delegacion de la ACNC parte hacia Azerbaiyan
articles.content:
Delegacion de la ACNC parte hacia Azerbaiyan
Pyongyang, 12 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La delegacion de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea encabezada por su presidente Kim Chang Gwang partio el dia 12 de esta capital para tomar parte en el V Congreso Mundial de Agencias Noticieras y en la 16a Asamblea General de la Organizacion de Agencias Noticieras de Asia-Pacifico que se celebraran en Baku, Azerbaiyan. 
					La delegacion fue despedida en el Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang por el vicepresidente de la ACNC, Rim Ho Ryong, y el ministro consejero de la embajada rusa en Corea, Alexandr Minayev.

articles.title: Declaran en Sur de Corea la resistencia popular por la dimision de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Declaran en Sur de Corea la resistencia popular por la dimision de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 12 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Segun transcendidos en Seul, fueron constituidas por regiones y sectores las entidades de lucha por la retirada del "poder" de Park Geun-hye.
					Segun el reporte de la Accion Emergente del Pueblo por la retirada del "poder" de Park Geun-hye, fueron constituidos hasta el dia 9 13 Consejos de Medidas por sectores como el Consejo Nacional de Estudiantes, la Solidaridad de Alumnos de Escuelas Secundarias y Superiores, el Consejo para la Situacion Emergente de Empresarios Pequenos y Medianos, la Direccion del Movimiento Cristiano.
					
					El primer consejo es compuesto por las asociaciones estudiantiles de 66 universidades y 39 organizaciones de estudiantes.
					
					La declaracion sobre la situacion fue publicada por los estudiantes en 135 lugares a lo largo del suelo surcoreano.
					
					Las filas de lucha se ampliaron al formarse nuevas entidades en Seul, la provincia de Jolla del Sur, la provincia de Kangwon del Sur de Corea y la isla Jeju.
					
					203 instituciones, inclusive la Direccion de Seul de la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos, constituyeron la Accion de Seul y publicaron la declaracion sobre la situacion en demanda de la retirada de Park.
					
					Se realizan simultaneamente las manifestaciones con velas en 68 regiones surcoreanas como ciudades, distritos, barrios.
					
					Por otra parte, los coreanos residentes en ultramar declararon que desplegaran la lucha solidaria de varias formas como la declaracion sobre la situacion y el mitin de velas coincidiendo con el levantamiento general de la poblacion surcoreana, programado para el dia 12.

articles.title: Investigador del IDP publica comentario sobre la situacion critica de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Investigador del IDP publica comentario sobre la situacion critica de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 12 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El investigador del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jong Kil Song, publico el dia 12 un comentario intitulado "El trato con la traidora Park Geun-hye a punto de arruinarse no traera nada mas que la verguenza y la deshonra". 
					El texto senala como sigue:
					
					La traidora surcoreana Park Geun-hye, que no puede eludir el enterramiento politico por su inaudito fraude politico, volvio a pronunciar un disparate contra la RPDC. 
					
					En estos momentos en que se encuentra bajo la avalancha de criticas por el escandalo politico que consterna a todo el mundo y se le acerca la severa sentencia del pueblo, ella hablo con un huesped extranjero sobre el futuro de alguien y los efectos de la sancion y presion.
					
					Es una conducta astuta para distraer la atencion de la opinion publica que insiste en que para la mandataria Park, la unica manera de pedir disculpas sinceramente al pueblo es retirarse ahora mismo del poder y someterse con gusto al castigo. 
					
					Hasta la fecha, la traidora viene hablando del cambio de la RPDC segun el consejo de su mentora bruja, pero el que esta por arruinarse es el poder titere de ella abandonada por la poblacion surcoreana por los escandalos de toda indole. 
					
					Es muy ridiculo el proceder de algunos paises que depositan alguna esperanza en las irrealizables promesas de cooperacion economica que hace ella. 
					
					Si estos paises, tentados por un punado de dinero, se ponen de acuerdo con los disparates del cadaver vivo Park, sufriran tremenda pena y verguenza. 
					
					Actualmente, hasta el amo norteamericano desprecia a su lacaya. 
					
					Un pais, que este interesado en la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region, debera ver correctamente la posicion estrategica y la realidad de la RPDC y establecer la politica conveniente.

articles.title: Se imparte cursillo de entrenadores de alto nivel de la FIFA
articles.content:
Se imparte cursillo de entrenadores de alto nivel de la FIFA
Pyongyang, 12 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia primero al 5 en esta capital el cursillo de entrenadores de alto nivel de la FIFA.
					Las lecciones se dieron divididas en la teoria y la practica y las recibieron los entrenadores de varios conjuntos deportivos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Se abordaron varios temas, entre otros, la direccion de entrenamiento de los jugadores, los metodos de ejercicios fisicos y el papel de entrenadores en los partidos de futbol.
					
					El cursillo estuvo a cargo del lector de la FIFA Constantine Stephen.
					
					Por otra parte, se efectuo del dia 7 al 11 el cursillo de entrenadores de la categoria juvenil de la FIFA.
